AFTER:
fmap = img.clone()

        for enc in self.encoders:
            fmap = enc(fmap)

        fmap, indices, commit_loss = self.vq(fmap)

        for dec in self.decoders:
            fmap = dec(fmap)

        recon_loss = F.mse_loss(fmap, img)
        loss = recon_loss + commit_loss
        return loss
